LanguageData.RT.PrisonersForEatingDesc: Allow this prisoner to be fed on by younger metroids
LanguageData.RT.allowBerserkChanceMetroidHungerToolti: Enable/disable metroids berserking when their food levels get too low (enabled by default)
LanguageData.RT.allowWildChanceMetroidBerserkTooltip: Enable/Disable metroids being able to untame when (and if) they berserk (enabled by default)
LanguageData.RT.allowBiggerMetroidsToBeTamedTooltip: Allow older metroids to have 99% wildness, rather than 1000% (disabled by default)
